resources.string:
This sample demonstrates the basic use of Camera2 API & TF on Android. You can display camera preview and take pictures. Flash light turns on automatically. Then the application will automatically predict what the thing in the picture is.
Powered with Talent&Heart by NCJ
(The things we support: Red Block、Green Block、Blue Block、爽歪歪、养乐多、娃哈哈AD钙奶、雪花啤酒、红牛、乐虎、黄色网球、标准三阶魔方、特仑苏纯牛奶)
